caseStudyDescription.caseStudyDescription: Research and product strategy consulting with a leading food delivery service

caseStudyContent.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"While at Kelton Global, I managed a key food delivery service client. and collaborated with their teams on a number of engagements over our year long partnership. I led a projects to help them understand their partners during the COVID-19 pandemic, and using storyboard concept testing, qualitative interviews, and remote contextual inquiry my work helped inform the yearâ€™s product priorities, design, and business decisions within two key verticals. I also led foundational qualitative research in a number of new verticals to surface innovation opportunities.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
